title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid data, including email, username, and password meeting all criteria.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter a valid username, a valid email address, and a strong password.
Submit the registration form.
The user account is created and a confirmation message or email is sent.

title: User Registration with Invalid Data
description: Verify that registration fails with invalid input such as missing fields, invalid email, or weak password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Try submitting the registration form leaving required fields empty or entering invalid data.
Appropriate error messages are displayed for each invalid input.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user can login successfully using valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
User is logged in and redirected to their personalized dashboard.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and displays error message with invalid username or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Check that login fails and an error message is displayed.

title: Dashboard Displays Accurate User Statistics
description: Verify that the user dashboard correctly displays the user's recent activity and platform-related statistics.

steps.description: Login as a valid user with known activity data.
Navigate to the dashboard page.
Verify that all statistics (questions asked, answers given, votes, bookmarks) are shown accurately.

title: Community Q&A: Ask New Question Successfully
description: Ensure authenticated users can ask a new question in the community Q&A section and it appears with real-time update.

steps.description: Login as a valid user.
Navigate to the Community Q&A Ask Question page.
Enter a valid question title and detailed description.
Submit the question.
The question is saved and visible in the question list immediately (real-time update).

title: Community Q&A: Answer Existing Question
description: Verify that users can provide answers to existing questions and those answers are added correctly.

steps.description: Login as a valid user.
Navigate to an existing question detail page.
Submit a valid answer to the question.
Answer appears under the question with proper formatting and is visible to all users.

title: Vote Up and Down on Questions and Answers
description: Test that users can upvote or downvote questions and answers and that the vote counts update in real-time.

steps.description: Login as a valid user.
Navigate to any question or answer.
Click on the upvote button and verify the vote count increments.
Click on the downvote button and verify the vote count decrements.
Vote counts update immediately and accurately for all connected users.

title: Bookmark Questions and Answers
description: Verify users can bookmark questions and answers and retrieve them from their profile or dashboard.

steps.description: Login as a valid user.
Navigate to a question or answer.
Click the bookmark icon to save the item.
The question or answer appears in the user's bookmarked list accessible from the dashboard.

title: Real-time Notifications Display
description: Ensure that when relevant events occur (such as answers to user questions or votes), notifications appear in real-time using SignalR.

steps.description: Login as User A and perform an action that triggers notification to User B.
Login as User B on a separate session and wait for notification.
User B receives the notification instantly without needing to refresh the page.

title: Private Localized Chat Functionality
description: Test that users can send and receive private chat messages using SignalR with correct localization applied.

steps.description: Login as two different users on separate sessions.
Initiate a private chat from User A to User B.
Send messages back and forth.
Messages are sent and received instantly with UI text appearing in selected language.

title: Posts & Stories Creation and Visibility
description: Verify users can create posts and stories and that content is visible to others as expected (temporary for stories, permanent for posts).

steps.description: Login as a valid user.
Create a new post with text and images.
Create a new story.
Posts remain permanently visible; stories are visible for the correct temporary duration.

title: Groups & Events Joining and Participation
description: Test users can join car enthusiast groups, view group content, and RSVP to events successfully.

steps.description: Login as a valid user.
Browse available groups and join a selected group.
View group posts and events.
RSVP to an event within the group.
User is successfully added to the group and RSVP status is recorded and shown.

title: Integrated Maps and Points of Interest Discovery
description: Verify users can discover car-friendly locations and tracks on the map and receive accurate details.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the maps and points of interest section.
Browse and search for car-friendly locations.
Locations appear correctly on the map with accurate details and user can interact with map features.

title: AI Assistant Response Accuracy
description: Verify that the AI assistant provides relevant and accurate answers to user queries within the chat widget interface.

steps.description: Login as a user.
Open the AI assistant chat widget.
Submit various questions related to car topics and platform usage.
AI assistant responds with relevant, helpful, and contextually correct answers.

title: Localization: Language Switch and RTL Support
description: Verify that users can switch between English and Arabic languages, and UI correctly adjusts for right-to-left text direction for Arabic.

steps.description: Login as a user.
Switch platform language to Arabic.
All text is displayed in Arabic and layout adjusts to right-to-left orientation.
Switch back to English.
Text reverts to English and layout orientation is left-to-right.

title: Admin Dashboard Translation Controls
description: Ensure translation administrators can dynamically update and manage translations for supported languages using the admin dashboard.

steps.description: Login as an admin user.
Navigate to the translation management section.
Update or add translations for a UI text key.
Save changes and apply them to the platform.
Translations are updated in the live environment and visible to users without requiring full deployment.
